channel.title: Select Gmail account when using the mail action
channel.description: Is there a way to select which Gmail account a Drafts email action opens? I am usually logged into two gmail accounts, one personal and one for business. But when I compose a message and click the email action it opens a new email draft in Gmail but it's not even clear which account it is, and no way to change. Is this possible? Thanks!

item.title: Select Gmail account when using the mail action
item.dc:creator: sylumer
item.description:
The mail action has no option to specify an account. You may be able to do something using a URL scheme.

https://support.google.com/mail/thread/121246097/ios-scheme-for-gmail-app-open-app-in-specific-account?hl=en
